p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane} Before J.J.L. Paul Justice of the Peace within and for said County and Territory The Territory of Washington vs. Ray Raymond W.D. Gillespie being duly sworn says: that he is a policeman within and for the city of Spokane Falls on the 26th day of June A.D. 1886, in the city of Spokane Falls in Spokane County, Wash- ington Territory, Ray Ray- mond did purposely and of her deliberate and precedented mal- ice kill James Finch then and there being by then and there shooting him in the neck with a pistol giving to him a mortal wound of which mortal wound the said James Finch then and there died. All contrary to the stated in such case made and provi- did, and against the peace and dignity of the Territory of Washington. W.D. Gillespie Subscribed and sworn to before me this 26th day of June A.D. 1886. Justice of the Peace within & for Spokane County, Washington Territory
